name: MPMediaPlaylistCreationMetadata
desc: A set of attributes used to describe a playlist when the playlist is first created.

items.name: init(name: String)
items.desc: Creates a new playlist metadata object with the designated name.

items.name: var authorDisplayName: String!
items.desc: App defined display name for the playlist.

items.name: var descriptionText: String
items.desc: The descriptive text for the playlist.
